text: Hey good people! I am pretty new to the HubSpot CMS and I need help from someone experienced to get more insight on what HubSpot CMS is capable of and what its not. We are planning to build the whole Online Store and a Customer Portal using HubSpot CMS as a UI tool and HubDb for some other things. I am just not sure if it is a correct tool for this. For now I just want to know if someone did that before or maybe doing that now.
